alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Kerr; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 4:48PM CDT until June 21 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bandera County in south central Texas... West central Kerr County in south central Texas... East central Real County in south central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lost Maples State Natural Area, or 8 miles north of Vanderpool, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medina and Lost Maples State Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
